title: Port freight quarterly statistics
description: Provisional quarterly statistics on freight handled by UK major ports
sizingNotes: Simple table structure with some footnotes
notes: Some of the decreases observed in the first quarter of 2020 could be related to the UK’s departure from the EU, storms Ciara and Dennis and the global coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, especially for unitised traffic, which includes passenger vehicles.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to Port and domestic waterborne freight statistics and click on the latest release, this will open a new page scroll to documents and 2 ODS documents are located in a zip file.  If only 2 tabs are visible within the ODS  you will need to right click in one of the visible tabs and the data tab will be displayed.
